``` {r}
get_conf_mat <- function(fit) {
  outcome <- .get_tune_outcome_names(fit)
  fit %>% 
    collect_predictions() %>% 
    conf_mat(truth = outcome, estimate = .pred_class)
}

```

``` {r forest pred}
# eminem_forest %>% get_pr()
kaas <- eminem_forest %>% get_conf_mat()

```

``` {r}
summary(kaas)
```

``` {r forest mosaic}
eminem_forest %>% get_conf_mat() %>% autoplot(type = "mosaic")
```
